nodes.name: MWSE Containers Extended
nodes.summary: Some new features for G7's classic mod.

nodes.name: Drippified Skills Module - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds chances for the DRIP mod to drop items increasing custom skills added by Skills Module mod

nodes.name: NPC Clothes Randomizer - MWSE
nodes.summary: Dynamically Randomizes Clothes for every NPC in the game.

nodes.name: Map Icons - MWSE
nodes.summary: Dynamically changes the local map markers to make them more helpful.

nodes.name: Flies - MWSE
nodes.summary: MWSE port of R-Zero's Flies mod, + some new features

nodes.name: Small Quality of Life Improvements - MWSE
nodes.summary: Some small fixes and quality of life changes (Map hotkey, Scroll easy equip...) I thought I'd share, not crucial enough to deserve their own mods. Happy Holydays!

nodes.name: Actual Illegal Resting - MWSE
nodes.summary: Makes Resting in towns and forts actually illegal instead of just impossible. I always found frustrating that because "resting is illegal here", I wasn't allowed to do it. Stealing

nodes.name: Effects Timers - MWSE
nodes.summary: Picture this: You are in a middle of a fight, swinging a bound longsword, when suddenly it vanishes right from your hand. The cast time is up, and because you had no idea how much

nodes.name: Key Broker - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds an NPC that will buy all your useless keys. If you manage to sell him all keys in-game, he will become a master trainer in security and start selling you secretmaster

nodes.name: Pacifist Way - Good Doctor - MWSE
nodes.summary: Curing Diseased or Blighted creatures will make them stop attacking you.

nodes.name: Disobedient Summons - MWSE
nodes.summary: Summonned Creatures will be more enclined to take sides with whoever has the highest conjuration skill. Which means that you'll have a chance to steal hostile NPCs summons if your

nodes.name: Obedient Summons - MWSE
nodes.summary: Allows you to give basic orders to your summoned creatures. Adds a new spell, called "Soul Release", allowing you to summon a soul trapped in a soulgem. You can now have Vivec or

nodes.name: Alchemy Cauldron - Multiple Potions at Once - MWSE
nodes.summary: Allows you to brew multiple potions at once (OpenMW style). No more need to torture your poor left mouse button to get 20 restore fatigue potions.

nodes.name: I'll Level Up Later - MWSE
nodes.summary: Ready for level up, but don't want to just yet? Really needing to rest? This mod adds a "Cancel" button to close the Level up menu without leveling up.

nodes.name: Opportune Landing - MWSE
nodes.summary: Falling on an NPC or creature will knock them down.

nodes.name: Creatures Silt Striders - MWSE
nodes.summary: This is an alpha release, still work in progress.Changes the silt striders in cities by actual creatures, with health points.Attacking these creatures is a crime, and the

nodes.name: MWSE Logger
nodes.summary: Feeling like one of your MWSE mods isn't working as it should but don't want to leave the game to go open the MWSE.log file and find out? This mod is for you.

nodes.name: Combat Enhanced - MWSE Edition
nodes.summary: MWSE Lua version of Combat Enhanced.

nodes.name: MWSE Name Randomizer for MWSE NPC Randomizer based on MWSE Character Creation Name Randomizer - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds lore friendly names, generated by Aleist3r's Character Creation Name Generator, to the NPCs randomly generated by hater8's MWSE Random NPC.

nodes.name: More Detailed Companion HealthBars MWSE Lua Script
nodes.summary: Tweaked version of Mesafoo's Companion HealthBars, showing Magicka, Fatigue as well as currently selected weapon.Also, added compatibility with Seph's HUD customizer.

nodes.name: Level Up Indicator - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds a level up indicator when you're ready to level up.

nodes.name: Enslaved - MWSE
nodes.summary: Playing as an Argonian or a Khajiit? Life is tough for you in Vvardenfell. Racism everywhere. And now, even slave traders abducting you during your sleep!

nodes.name: Physical Journal - MWSE
nodes.summary: Changes the Journal into a physical item in your inventory. So that you can throw it away or sell it if you don't want to be the people's hero anymore.

nodes.name: Fence it - MWSE
nodes.summary: Tired of not being able to sell your diamonds to Nalcarya because of that stupid thieves guild quest?Give them to a pawnbroker and he will make them unrecognizable!For a price of

nodes.name: Bleeding Injuries - MWSE
nodes.summary: Wear armor. Seriously. Battles are dangerous.

nodes.name: Farhrenheit 451 - MWSE
nodes.summary: Ever dreamt of becoming an arsonist? This mod is for you.

nodes.name: Auto Weapon Readied - MWSE
nodes.summary: No need to manually ready your weapon anymore!

nodes.name: Race and Sex randomizer - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds a button in the Race & Sex menu that randomly picks a race, a sex, a face and a hairstyle for your char.

nodes.name: OpenHUD - MWSE Port
nodes.summary: Basically OpenHUD, but for MWSE. Requires Seph's Hud Customizer.

nodes.name: Training Rebalance - MWSE
nodes.summary: Training does not guaranty a skill improvement anymore.When you use the training service, there is a chance (based on your luck, fatigue and the trainer skill) for you to fail the

nodes.name: QuickKeys Hotbar - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds a Hotbar to the game with all your hotkeys displayed.v1.2 should be the final version. Have fun!

nodes.name: Critical Lockpicking and Trap Disarming - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds critical failure and critical success to the Lockpicking/Trap Disarming mechanism.

nodes.name: Elemental Projectile Hits - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds a little VFX when your elemental enchanted arrow/bolt/throwing weapon hits something.

nodes.name: Animal Extinction - MWSE
nodes.summary: Ever dreamt of killing every cliffracer in the game? Now you can.

nodes.name: Enchant Drain - MWSE
nodes.summary: Adds a buyable spell called "Enchant Drain", that allows you to use your enchanted staves and amulets as a supplementary mana pool for the duration of the spell.

nodes.name: The Marksman Challenge
nodes.summary: Small repeatable quest that can earn you money. Challenge an expert archer into a marksmanship showdown and show the world how skilled you are! Talk to the bosmer Hobin Rood

nodes.name: Thief - Pickpocketers of Vvardenfell (MWSE)
nodes.summary: Gives a random chance to thieves, rogues and paupers in the game to steal an item from you if you get too close to them.

nodes.name: The Iron Fist - A Hand-to-hand Overhaul (MWSE)
nodes.summary: Wearing Gauntlets during a hand-to-hand fight will cause health damage to your opponents.

nodes.name: Infectious Sewers - MWSE
nodes.summary: Spending too much time in the sewers makes you sick

nodes.name: QuickKey Outlander - MWSE
nodes.summary: QuickKey Outlander, I haven't much time!  Hot Keys are a wonderful thing. They allow for very easy access to healing/teleportation/whatever you need. But they're so tedious to

nodes.name: Menus Hider on Item Select - MWSE
nodes.summary: In OpenMW, when you select an item in your inventory, the Magic, Stats and Map menus automatically hide when your mouse hovers them to not obstruct your view when placing said item

nodes.name: Erratic Magic
nodes.summary: If you or an NPC fails to cast a spell, the caster will be randomly teleported somewhere in Vvardenfell.

nodes.name: The Spellmaker - MWSE
nodes.summary: Have you ever dreamt of being able to create new spells by yourself, instead of relying on NPC's ? Now you can.

nodes.name: Real Fire Damage - MWSE Edition
nodes.summary: This mod does exactly the same as AmazingChopin's Real Fire Damage, but using MWSE lua instead of an esp plugin. This makes the mod work for every fire source in the game, even

nodes.name: Acid Rain
nodes.summary: The rain in Vvardenfell is now acidic. Find shelter as soon as possible!

nodes.name: Smart Bound LongBow with Arrows
nodes.summary: The Bound LongBow spell now also equips you with arrows to use with it. When the spell is casted, it generates one random type of arrow between 6 possible choices and adds 100 of

nodes.name: Dagon Fel - Mages Adventures
nodes.summary: Adds 4 quests (for now) to Utseeva's [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/morrowind/mods/44576]Dagon Fel Mage's Guild[/url].To start the quests : - Talk to Ehtra about duties (3 quests,
